Articles.Content:
[Okay so this is my first post/craft so be gentle 8) ]

I present to you, ladies and gentlemen, the Sparrowhawk. Rigorous testing and explosions have gone into the construction of the beast you see before you.

It\'s a tricky little stunt plane, capable of landing and relaunching, with nose and tail RCS for tight manoeuvres and deceleration into landing.

Oh...and did I mention it launches with overslung SRBs? Jeb is happy ;D 

> ![x7EY3.png](http://i.imgur.com/x7EY3.png)
> ![rhgllh.png](http://i.imgur.com/rhgllh.png)
> 
> ![C5RHWh.png](http://i.imgur.com/C5RHWh.png)
> 
> ![MctiS.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MctiS.jpg)

Thoughts/ improvements welcome, just thought i\'d share with y\'all what was distracting me from my exam revision ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Edit: sorry should mention mods! only things added are the Timberdyne struts and the MeiLong Asas from White Monkey ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Edit 2: my bad, attached wrong file :/
